text: STANDUP: Payments Ops (2026-02-03) | IN_PROGRESS: Investigating settlement mismatch in batch #2026-02-03 | BLOCKERS: No confirmation yet whether webhook hotfix affected settlement records | RISKS: Settlement mismatch (+18,420 AED) may delay merchant payouts today

SLACK: [09:41] Nadia | NOTES: Risk: new affiliate campaign traffic looks abnormal (same device fingerprint repeating).; Could be incentive abuse. Any volume spike?; +35% vs baseline in 2 hours.

EMAIL: URGENT: Settlement mismatch in batch #2026-02-03 | FROM: finance.ops@company.ae | EXCERPT: Hi team, We noticed a mismatch between the settlement report and ledger totals for batch #2026-02-03.
